frontmatter.title: Smart Rooms and Colorful Lights: Designing an Innovative Home Environment
frontmatter.summary: Discover how I utilized Amazon Alexa and ESP32 modules to create smart home solutions that seamlessly connect to Alexa. I also developed remote-controlled RGB lights using an ESP32, with a custom app designed by my friend, transforming my living space into a vibrant, interactive environment.
